rows.stringify: $(identity.pronouns.singular) will always try to perch $(identity.pronouns.thirdPerson)self on furniture.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) spends most of $(identity.pronouns.possessive) free time on the top of buildings.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) enjoys drawing copies of other drawings.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) excels at sculpting wooden replicas of objects.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) enjoys mimicking the voice of $(identity.pronouns.possessive) non-kenku friends.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) uses a different voice for every word $(identity.pronouns.singular) speaks.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is often found staring at the sky.
$(identity.pronouns.possessive) sentences are always ponctuated with seemingly random sounds.
